T02bsa017_u:5: nānopadeśagaṇasaṃkulasaptabhedais teṣāṃ sphuṭāvagataye kriyate prayatnaḥ // Tra_2 //
T02bsa017_u:6: saṃbhrāntabodhā nikhilā hi tīrthyās tattvasya sādhyasya ca rūpavittau /
T02bsa017_u:7: tebhyaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ kila tattvavettā vedāntavādīti[jana] pravādaḥ // Tra_3
T02bsa017_u:14: saṃpūrya dānādiguṇānaśeṣān saṃbuddhya kṛtyaṃ sakalaṃ ca kṛtvā /
T02bsa017_u:15: yabhdūtakoṭeḥ karaṇaṃ ca sākṣāt sādhyaṃ tadapyasti nirodharūpam // Tra_7
T02bsa017_u:18: svadevatākāraviśeṣaśūnyaṃ prāgeva saṃbhāvya sukhaṃ sphuṭaṃ sat /
T02bsa017_u:20: kṛtvā sākṣāt svādhipaṃ sātarūpaṃ paścāt tyaktvā sātamātraṃ phalaṃ syāt /
T02bsa017_u:21: śuddhaṃ sākṣācchakyate naiva kartuṃ tenākāro bhāvitaḥ svādhipasya //
T02bsa017_u:22: gagaṇasamaśarīraṃ lakṣaṇairbhūṣitāṅgaṃ nirupamasukhapūrṇaṃ svābhayā saṃgataṃ ca /
T02bsa017_u:23: sphuradamitamunīndraḥ sarvasattvārthakāri pravadati punaranyaḥ sādhyamucchedaśūnyam // Tra_11
T02bsa017_u:24: kṛtvā sākṣāt svādhipaṃ sātarūpaṃ bhāvopekṣājñānamātraṃ phalaṃ syāt /
T02bsa017_u:26: kṛtvā sākṣānmaṇḍalaṃ sātarūpaṃ paścāttasya svecchayā nirvṛtiṃ ca /
T02bsa017_u:27: sattvārthasyāpyastyabhāvo na vāsmin prādurbhāvo nirvṛtādasti yasmāt //
T02bsa017_u:28: kṛtvā sphuṭaṃ rūpamabhīṣṭameṣāṃ paścānnirodhaṃ phalamāha kaścit /
T02bsa017_u:29: abhinnarūpaśca yato nirodho na pakṣabhede 'pi tato 'sti bhedaḥ // Tra_14
T02bsa017_u:31: yasmāt sarvo bhāvanāsu prayāso vyarthaḥ prāptastatphalasya prasiddheḥ //
T02bsa017_u:33: yasmāt sarvo bhāvanādau prayatno buddhoddiṣṭo niṣphalaḥ saṃprasaktaḥ //
T02bsa017_u:35: turīyaśasyaṃ paripākameta(ti) sphuṭaṃ caturthaṃ viduṣo 'pi gūḍham //
T02bsa017_u:37: vāyoḥ svarūpaṃ galaśuṇḍikādyam atattvarūpaṃ svayamūhanīyam // Tra_18 //
T02bsa017_u:39: anyaiśca sarvairupamābhidheyair naivāsti sādhyaṃ kathitādihānyat // Tra_19
